entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:26 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:26 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
